attributes.action: MANDATORY DOMESTIC ABUSE TRAINING FOR EMPLOYERS
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to make it a MANDATORY requirement for employers to have DOMESTIC ABUSE AWARENESS TRAINING.  It is necessary to have a FIRE MARSHALL and a TRAINED FIRST AIDER to save lives.    DOMESTIC ABUSE COSTS LIVES SO MAKE IT AS IMPORTANT AND MAYBE WE CAN REDUCE THE AVERAGE OF 2 PEOPLE A WEEK IN THE UK KILLED BY A CURRENT OR EX PARTNER
